title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Online Instructional Design for Understanding BPPV

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the etiology and diagnostic criteria of BPPV with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can accurately reproduce at least four steps of the Dix-Hallpike test.
Learners can list at least three key safety protocols when applying the Epley maneuver.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
